title: Australia's new north-west. Pt. 2: The Pilbara-Hamersley region
brief_description: This program deals with the pastoral and timber industries in the Pilbara area, the development of iron ore mining at Mount Tom Price and the growth of towns and industries as a result. Narrated by Roger Climpson.
